extendedInfo.description: Ultimate Food Value Diary Plus 2013 Edition - Calculator, Scanner, Database, Weight Tracker with Target & Milestone Watchers - Mobile AppAre you following a diet based on food values / scores? Do you calculate those values / scores based upon protein, carbs, fat & fiber?  Do you want to stop paying huge monthly fees ?Do you want an integrated Tracker & Diary, Calculators for Food, Alcohol & Exercise, Barcode Scanner, HUGE Food Database, Value Estimator, Eating Out Guide (180+ Restaurants) , Meal Maker, Exercise Database PLUS Weight Tracking & Goal Watcher in one mobile app for your phone or tablet ?Then you have found the ultimate app for you and one that has been specially designed to help you throughout your weight loss journey, and to provide you with the support to enable you to meet to your goals and more importantly....stay there !.  It's the ultimate diet watchers friend that points you in the correct direction for your weight loss.The key to dieting is tracking your weight and watching what you eat, with this app you can do both in one place. Using this application as designed points to you meeting your weight loss goal and become a champion diet watcher!With this one time low cost app, you have everything in your pocket to succeed ! REMEMBER : Having issues? , can't download? , contact us! - we can not connect & help via comments on Google Play but our dedicated team can if you contact us via our site : http://goo.gl/YOIdrâ Large Online Food Database > 500,000 items â USA & UK Restaurant Listings - 180+ searchable. â Barcode scanner > 1,000,000 barcodes (Requires auto focus camera, please check your device)â Value estimator - 95% accuracy estimate of a food from just the calories.â Meal Maker allowing you to group items together as a meal with automatic portion calculation. â Exercise database that takes into account your weight.â Full and only 100% accurate plus diet watchers tracking system built in.â Food, Alcohol & Exercise calculator for USA Plus, UK Pro & Australia Proâ Full export of diary to spreadsheet and text files. â Daily Allowance Calculator with new 2012 & 2013 figures and extra boost diet watchers calculations to get the exact daily figure for your weight.â Track healthy choices plus even record your daily notes â Weight loss progress tracking & measurement progress tracking with advanced graphs & goal setting to accurately watch your progress.â Two great widgets - Dashboard and Weight.â Unlimited food & exercise favorites â Help â Includes diet watchers pro to boost your weight loss.------- Also on iPhone/iPod & iPad : http://appstore.com/fenlandersoftwaresolutionsltd------Visit our website to read what people have been saying about this application and the amount of weight serious diet watchers are losing using it! , here are a few examplesâââââ My wife lost over 40 pounds with this app. The barcode scanner makes things easy. I am dropping pounds and feeling healthy with the help of this app - Reggieâââââ This is an amazing app makes weight lose so easy. I love it -  Celena âââââ This makes dieting easy!  - Bridgetteâââââ Best way to watchers weight , a must for all diet watchers ! - Clarie ------ This is not a weight loss program , but a tool that points you in the correct direction when used along side a weight loss program you are already involved with. So if your a diet WatchersWeight is your problem, this is the app.DECLARATION : Please note, this application is not endorsed or affiliated by any weight loss system, including Weight Watchersâ¢ which is a registered trademark of Weight Watchers International.Keywords:Ultimate Weight Watchers Diary , Weight Watchers, Pro Points, Points Plus

reviews.title: Very happy
reviews.comment: I actually tried this app thinking \'ya right!\' I am extremely happy with how easy and quick it is to use. I\'ve lost 7lbs in the first week! Thank you.
reviews.author: Marie-anne Scurr

reviews.title: The Best!
reviews.comment: After trying many different food and exercise trackers, this beats all! Super easy to use and effortless to put in my day\'s data. Fantastic app!!!
reviews.author: Shelly Brown

reviews.title: Just as good as the original
reviews.comment: Great great app! Didn\'t mind paying $3.99 for the 2013 version. It\'s excellent.
reviews.author: M Gray

reviews.comment: Great app.  Easy to use & follow progress.  Update wiped out everything stored.\tEasy to monitor food intake.  Only disapointment, one of the updates cleared everything I had stored in favorites.
reviews.author: Rose Johnson

reviews.comment: I love this app. It is so easy to use. Well worhh the money paid for it and much cheaper than weight watchers.
reviews.author: Zandra Clary

reviews.title: Good,but unreliable  database searches
reviews.comment: Very similar to the older version. Needs to have the database search feature fixed as it quits or cannot connect about a third of the time
reviews.author: Alice Schwartz

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Have used it in the past & just purchased it again.  Great app for keeping track of foods eaten & exercise to help with goals.  The trick to losing weight is writing it all down.  Works great on Droid RAZR MAX HD!
reviews.author: Heidi Schaffnit

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Love this app so much. Have been using it for a week. A light theme would be a nice option compared to the dark. Well worth the money. Thank you.
reviews.author: Linda Samanci

reviews.title: Awesome, but...
reviews.comment: There are a few niggles but overall it\'s great. Has helped me lose 2st 8lbs. Thought it a bit cheeky to have to pay again for what is ultimately an update from their previous tracker
reviews.author: Stuart Ward

reviews.title: Great and easy
reviews.comment: I really enjoy this app.  I have used other ww apps as well as calorie counters and this is by far more convenient. Was a little concerned about paying for an update from the previously purchased version but I am very happy with it.
reviews.author: Nicole Hassing

reviews.comment: I absolutely love this app! It definitely is the best weight watcher app I have found. Love love love it!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Pheobe Buffet

reviews.title: Love this app.So easy to use
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t follow the plan without it. My husband and I both use it. Love ask the features eg food diary, data base of PP values places for keeping record of exercise weight body measurments etc
reviews.author: Lily Hislop

reviews.title: Must Have even if not doing weight watchers
reviews.comment: I have been using for a year.  It works the best of any I\'ve used (and I mean going all the way back to the palm pilot).  The barcode upgrade is the best and being able to scan and access a global product database is incredible convenient.  I use this instead of WW.
reviews.author: David Beecher

reviews.title: Excellent resource
reviews.comment: Very convenient.  I do wish the restaurant database was larger, but there are enough tools and if you have common sense you can manually calculate your own points. Thanks!
reviews.author: Andrew Staheli

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Love this app. I\'ve done online Weight Watchers before and this app is very comparable if not better!  Scanner and database are so extensive you can look up just about anything! Very affordable!
reviews.author: Melissa Dorsey

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This app is the best I\'ve found so far. I\'ve used itrack Bites, but I bought a new phone and could no longer find the app. This one is better than the one I used previously.
reviews.author: Catonnya J

reviews.title: I\'m enjoying it so far. Its easy to use.
reviews.comment: Easy to add to daily diary..extensive data base. Nice app
reviews.author: Kris McIntyre

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Best W.W. app since I lost my favorite one on my old phone! Love love love it! First week and already down 6lbs!
reviews.author: Jenny Moore

reviews.title: Generally excellent.
reviews.comment: I has helped to lose 17lbs in 7 weeks. It just makes the tracking so easy.
reviews.author: Derry Murphy

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: I love this app its a less expensive alternative to the actual Weight Watchers.
reviews.author: AJ DelSignore
